title: Velocity v time graph of oscillating system

content.question: A block that is connected to a horizontal spring is allowed to oscillate, and a graph of its velocity as a function of time is shown in the figure. At <math alttext="t equals 7 seconds" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></math>, the block detaches from the spring. All frictional forces are considered to be negligible. What distance will the block travel from <math alttext="t equals 7 seconds" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="t equals 10 seconds" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
